Title: The Unkillable
Description:
I'm bettin' dat ogre Mai'Zoth is behind all dis. He should have died long ago, but his magics still be strong. 

He be using the altar's centerpiece as a conduit to drain Lukou's power.

Recover the centerpiece and prove he's not so unkillable when he doesn't have a loa hostage.
ObjectivesText: Recover the altar centerpiece from Mai'Zoth.
PortraitGiverText: Mai'Zoth has been a thorn in Stranglethorn Vale for years.
